sentences.en: "I want to send a telegram." — "Fine, to whom?"
Desperate for money, she called her sister, whom she hadn’t spoken to in 20 years.
sentences.cn: 因为急需用钱，她就给姐姐打了电话，她们已经20年没说过话了。

sentences.en: Do any other family members reside with you? Yes/No If yes, whom?
sentences.cn: 是否有其他家庭成员和你住一起？如果是，谁？

sentences.en: From whom shall I get comfort?
sentences.cn: 我从谁那儿能得到安慰呢?

sentences.en: He asked whom I'd told about his having been away.
sentences.cn: 他问我把他曾离开的消息告诉过谁。

sentences.en: He is critical of the monks, whom he considers narrow-minded and self-righteous.
sentences.cn: 他对僧侣们颇有微词，认为他们思想偏狭，自视清高。

sentences.en: He likes to know whom you've met.
He overworks and underpays the poor clerk whom he employs.
sentences.cn: 他让那个可怜的职员超负荷工作，却只支付极低的薪水。

sentences.en: He was a personal friend whom I've known for many many years.
sentences.cn: 他是一位我认识多年的私人朋友。

sentences.en: One writer in whom I had taken an interest was Immanuel Velikovsky.
sentences.cn: 我感兴趣的其中一位作家是伊曼纽尔·韦利科夫斯基。

sentences.en: She wondered whether he had someone to whom he could talk freely.
sentences.cn: 她不知道他是否有可以倾心交谈的对象。

sentences.en: Soldiers took away four people one of whom was later released.
sentences.cn: 士兵们抓走4个人，其中1个随后被放了回来。

sentences.en: Speculation was rife as to whom the prince might marry.
sentences.cn: 大家都在推测王子会娶谁.

sentences.en: The dispute at the moment revolved about the question of whom to send.
sentences.cn: 当时的争论是围绕着派谁去好这一问题而进行的。

sentences.en: There were officials to whom he could relate the whole story.
sentences.cn: 有一些官员会听他讲述整个故事。

sentences.en: This was the man whom other trainers love to carp about.
sentences.cn: 这就是老被其他教练挑毛病的那个人。

sentences.en: Whom would it profit to terrify or to kill James Sinclair?
sentences.cn: 恐吓或者干掉詹姆斯·辛克莱对谁会有好处？

trans.tran_en: the object form of ‘who’, used especially in formal speech or writing
